name: Student Taught Courses (STUCO): Music: Deep-diving Artists and Genres
base_name: Student Taught Courses (STUCO): Music: Deep-diving Artists and Genres
long_desc: Students will be introduced to artists such as Frank Ocean and Lady Gaga as well as subcategories such as shoegaze and new wave. Each week will comprise different genres and specific artists. These genres and artists will be delved into through their history, discography, and how they continue to influence certain forms of society.

custom_fields.goals: Overall goal of this course is that students will be able to understand complexities that exist through lyricism for artists as well as the historical context and intertwining relations that music genres have with each other.
custom_fields.key_topics: Different genres of music, currents events in the music industry; how specific artists have shaped pop culture in general
custom_fields.relevance: This course is relevant to the targeted student population since this is a heavily STEM-based college; this course exists for those who enjoy indulging hobbies such as music. It is also relevant to introduce pop culture for those who take interest.
custom_fields.learning_resources: Canvas page with all necessary links
